product_name: Nite Ize BugLit LED Micro Flashlight
long_description: The innovative Nite Ize BugLit LED Micro flashlight sports a fun, cool design that's exceptionally useful in a wide variety of applications. The body is a durable INOVA Microlight flashlight that features 4 modes: high power, low power, strobe and signal. Bright, white LED has an effective range of up to 50 ft. and is visible up to 1 mile away. Securely attached legs are made up of 2 flexible gear ties that can be bent, wrapped and twisted into many different configurations. The Nite Ize BugLit LED Micro flashlight features a built-in S-Biner clip that lets you attach it to zipper pulls, key chains and more.
short_description: The innovative Nite Ize BugLit LED Micro flashlight sports a fun, cool design that's exceptionally useful in a wide variety of applications.
